description:
Lum and Ataru are left alone together when his parents go out for some alone time of their own! However, Mendou and the Stormtroopers aren`t keen on that idea.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Lum and Ataru, A Night Alone
Lum to Ataru - Futari Dake no Yoru
On est tout seul ce soir
ラムとあたる・ 二人だけの夜
